resources.string: "Tech 2 Go team members will properly maintain equipment, tape down and conceal cables and adhere to all established safety procedures including the necessary organizational structures and policies and procedures."

"Tech 2 Go will provide the latest and most up to date equipment that is properly maintained by our team members so that it is properly functioning and cosmetically appealing, team members are empowered to proactively request new equipment at all times to meet this standard and ensure our customers satisfaction and receive the latest technology available to the task in hand."

"Tech 2 Go team members are skilled and knowledgeable in their areas of expertise, they will execute all time lines in a positive and proactive manner. We are proud to achieve your goals in both quality and schedule wise terms."

"Tech 2 Go team members will consistently and proactively demonstrate confidence and empathy with a positive attitude to show a continual sense of urgency for every customer request , team members will be empowered and accountable for the complete success of every installation and will greet and thank the customers with vigor and energy at all times including on the telephone ."

"Tech 2 Go team members will work together with the customers in a proactive pre-planning effort and offer creative ideas for each request to solidify redundant business and create new relationships."
"With Tech2Go realize your dreams come to life"

"Features:

" " • Sound re-enforcement.
" " • Multi – channel distribution.
" " • Simulation interpretation.
" " • Real – time electronic voting.
" " • Microphone management / name handling.
" " • Automated camera control.
" " • Broadcast feed.
" " • Teleconferencing / video conferencing.
" " • Verbatim recording and digital archiving.
"

"Applications:

" " • Bank ATMs.
" " • Markets.
" " • Hospitals.
" " • Residential (Towers, Apartments, and Villas).
" " • Organizations …etc.
"

"Features:

" " • Time attendance and control for all environments.
" " • Controlling and access monitoring.
" " • Protecting any restricted or secret areas.
" " • Visitors identification and management.
" " • Multiple-entrance prevention.
" " • Incoming and outgoing access control.
"
We are proud to introduce our ambitious relationship with the systems used in our solutions.
